mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS id, USER_PW AS pw, USER_AREA AS area FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{id} AND USER_PW = #{pw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_AREA) VALUES (#{id}, #{pw}, #{area})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID AS id, USER_AREA AS area FROM T_USER
SELECT USER_ID AS id, USER_AREA AS area FROM T_USER WHERE USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR USER_AREA LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
SELECT REG_DT AS "date", DETECT_TYPE AS "type", CAMERA_LOC AS "loc", PROG_STATUS AS "prog", DETECT_ID AS "det_id" FROM T_DETECTION

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DETECT_ID AS det_id, D.CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, TO_CHAR(D.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "date", D.DETECT_TYPE AS type, D.CAMERA_LOC AS loc, -- ▼ 카메라 정보 전부 매핑 (VO 필드명과 동일한 별칭) C.REGION AS region, C.GU AS gu, C.DONG AS dong, C.INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, C.INST_DT AS inst_dt, C.LATITUDE AS latitude, C.LONGITUDE AS longitude, C.CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_DETECTION D JOIN T_CAMERA C ON D.CAMERA_ID = C.CAMERA_ID WHERE D.DETECT_TYPE IN ('헬멧 미착용','2인이상 탑승') ORDER BY D.REG_DT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20

SELECT CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, REGION AS region, GU AS gu, DONG AS dong, INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, INST_DT AS inst_dt, LATITUDE AS latitude, LONGITUDE AS longitude, CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_CAMERA ORDER BY CAMERA_ID

SELECT d.DETECT_ID AS det_id, d.CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, d.DETECT_TYPE AS type, d.PROG_STATUS AS prog, TO_CHAR(D.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "date", d.CAMERA_LOC AS loc, c.REGION AS region, c.GU AS gu, c.DONG AS dong, c.INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, c.INST_DT AS inst_dt, c.LATITUDE AS latitude, c.LONGITUDE AS longitude, c.CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_DETECTION d JOIN T_CAMERA c ON c.CAMERA_ID = d.CAMERA_ID WHERE d.DETECT_ID = #{det_id}

SELECT D.DETECT_ID AS det_id, D.CAMERA_ID AS camera_id, TO_CHAR(D.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "date", D.DETECT_TYPE AS type, D.CAMERA_LOC AS loc, -- ▼ 카메라 정보 전부 매핑 C.REGION AS region, C.GU AS gu, C.DONG AS dong, C.INST_PURPOSE AS inst_purpose, C.INST_DT AS inst_dt, C.LATITUDE AS latitude, C.LONGITUDE AS longitude, C.CAMERA_LOC AS camera_loc FROM T_DETECTION D JOIN T_CAMERA C ON D.CAMERA_ID = C.CAMERA_ID WHERE D.DETECT_ID > #{value} ORDER BY D.REG_DT DESC
